name: Sunset
description:
Sunset is a Sci-Fi TPS set in a near future where space exploration has brought humans to colonize new planets in search of the resources depleted on Earth. Ten light-years away, as one of Earth's main Space Stations approaches Dracon Ismenios' orbit, attracted by signals of a high density of precious minerals, a group of space mercenaries known as Nortens attacks the colony, taking the surviving crew hostage. During a training session on Earth’s International Army's basecamp you receive the S.O.S. from the Station and, against your superiors' orders, you immediately steal a spaceship and embark on a solitary journey to save the survivors, knowing that among them is your son. When your spaceship gets damaged and falls on Dracon Ismenios, your mission will be to find a way back, before it is too late.

KEY FEATURES

Explore the breathtaking sceneries of an alien planet filled with beauty and danger, on a quest to repair your spaceship and save your son. Discover the hidden mysteries of Dracon Ismenios while fighting with the Nortens, mining cinnabar to recharge your weapons and trading with the Merchant, the only person on the planet willing to sell you pieces of your spaceship.

A NEW SHOOTING EXPERIENCE


Shooting, mining, and using your Division’s special tools, all the major gameplay dynamics will be available thanks to your solar powered backpack. Remember to charge it any chance you get or you’d better find somewhere to hide!
All the relevant information will be displayed through diegetic objects, no HUD will ruin your immersion in the game.

YOUR GAMEPLAY


The Division you’ll choose at the beginning of the game will determine your equipment, and special abilities. It will be up to you to find your own unique way to play Sunset. Become the best soldier of the planet by engaging in fast-paced battles or skillfully avoid combat to save more cinnabar and use it to personalize your character or trade objects with the Merchant, the fate of this journey is in your hands.

DISCOVER DRACON ISMENIOS


Discover the untouched landscapes of Dracon Ismenios, with its rich and varied biomes and the many challenges they hide. Find your own way to interact with native creatures, natural events and the unique geography of each sector, adapting your playing style and strategic thinking to each location.

BOSS & EVENTS


Every sector has its own boss fight that you need to complete to unlock new sectors of the map. Inside the game many randomly spawned events will happen, making your experience of a sector different every time. Every few months, organized events like treasure hunts will also give the players the chance to discover the hidden mysteries of Dracon Ismenios, while chasing ancient alien artifacts and deciphering complex riddles.

RANKING & REWARDS


Bringing cinnabar back to your basecamp will allow you to upgrade your ranking in your Division and unlock new skins, helms and vehicles on the in-game shop. Don’t worry, the only values required here are cinnabar, cinnabar and more cinnabar.

CREATED WITH UNREAL® ENGINE 4

Sunset is being created using Unreal® Engine 4 to deliver the best interactive experience possible.
